item.title: Mechanical Keyboards
item.description: When it comes to keyboards I wasn’t really having any real preference. When it started getting interested in computers - mostly for gaming - I used some random full sized membrane keyboard. I used it, because it was around. Not ever was I giving a deeper thought into how I gave inputs into a PC. Customized apple magic keyboard After switching away from PC to Apple hardware I mainly stuck with apple keyboards.
